Sentencas: A strategy based on tape-casting and laser micro-processing was proposed to enhance the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells by modifying the electrolytes with a windows structure and a dimples array structure.
Titulo: Modification of electrolyte surface with windows and dimples array structure for SOFC based on YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy images of the windows structure indicated that the thickness of electrolyte in the thin areas was reduced from 220 gm to 75 pm, resulting in a significant decrease in ohmic resistance by a factor of 1.69 at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Modification of electrolyte surface with windows and dimples array structure for SOFC based on YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: In addition, three-dimensional profile images of the dimples array structure showed a remarkable increase in the electrode/electrolyte interface area that is directly related to the triple-phase boundaries.
Titulo: Modification of electrolyte surface with windows and dimples array structure for SOFC based on YSZ electrolyte

Sentencas: Furthermore, following the modifications in this work, the optimal cell in this study achieved an encouraging performance relative to that of the reference cell, with the peak power density increasing by a factor of 1.63 at 800 degrees C. These results implied that effective structural modification may be a promising approach for improving cell performance.
Titulo: Modification of electrolyte surface with windows and dimples array structure for SOFC based on YSZ electrolyte
